name: Sprite Sequence Chapter 2
description:
The second Chapter of the Sprite Sequence saga. Haven't played Chapter 1 yet? It's FREE on Steam! Head over to its page to start the adventure.

Thrown into a new, unknown world, our protagonist will have to learn to fend for himself and survive in the wild before he can be freed from his ordeal.

Key features :
- Story oriented
- Exploration with light puzzle and combat sections
- One part features a small farm simulation
- Hand-drawn and animated
- Around 20 - 30 minutes long

Chapter 2 is a higher-definition compilation of the short sequences #11 to #26 published in 2016. The improvisation based process at the heart of the project gave rise to a surprising story that is getting more complex and detailed in this chapter.
